name: Jonathan Sobieski
text: Pizza is always on point. If you're looking for a good quality pizza done fast...this is the place. Can fully customize your pizza or choose from one already pre selected on the menu. Staff is friendly and always wearing masks. Don't forget to sign up on the app and rack up your flames for free stuff.

name: Aaron Gray
text: Solid pizza spot. Staff was very attentive. It was our first time so they walked us through the process. I recommend you build your own pizza, plenty of options for no extra charge. We had the Hot Link and Green Stripe speciality pizzas. Both were delicious.

name: Mike Donnelly
text: No Masks, Total Cluster.  Avoid this location.  Placed a simple online order for three pizzas.  Walked inside when I received a text saying my order was ready.  Half the customers inside were not wearing any masks whatsoever,  including …More

name: Susan Izzo
text: I wanted to place an order online. I wanted it to be 1/2 plain & 1/2 crumbled meatballs. I saw no where to specify that. I called approximately 3 times and spoke with 3 different people who could not give me an answer, …More

name: Sharon Sharon
text: Long line, but service was fast. Pizza was a bit too salty...maybe it was the base. The drink selections were good and the staff was friendly and efficient.

name: Sylvia Barahona
text: Stopped by today for a late lunch and we were the only customers there. Service was lackluster at best, pizza was good but what I couldn't get past was how dirty everything was. Filthy floors that look like they haven't been swept or mopped …More

name: Derrick K
text: Great pizza. Awesome crew. Very impressed. My first visit. Will definitely go back

name: Josh Marcum
text: Absolutely delicious wood fired thin crust pizza with exemplary service. You can build your own or order one of their specials.

name: Ronald Joseph
text: Blaze pizza !!! first time trying it best pizza I had In while, benson was great friendly and respect

name: Parag P. Joshi
text: Great selection of toppings (loads!) All for one flat price on a thin crust pie. What's not to love?

name: Krystal Ray
text: This was my first time here the food and service was great big thank you to Kari for all her help and patients with me!

name: SoBe Owns
text: I ate a pizza from there almost 3-4x a week for nearly a month after my first time eating there. Service was great,  place was clean. Gets a bit busy around 6-7pm but the staff were always nice. Bacon pepperoni meatballs can't go wrong, …More

name: Dorphelin Dupervil
text: Outstanding customer service, probably the only place where I can get quality pizza. If you not eating blaze you not livin right!!

name: Two Fat Meatballs
text: Very unorganized. Stood in front of menu for several minutes while gentleman behind the counter figured out what to do. The whole time a manager was sitting at a table, never jumping in to help, guide or train. Great concept, just need more …More

name: GC Bustos
text: Great Keto pizza. Awesome taste! It's not big so for 3/4 people you have to get 2. I wish they had anchovies as a topping.

name: Davi Towbin
text: Love thin, make your own pizza. Clean, fast, delish...and great service. Try the garlic knots too.

name: Paul Dudley
text: I went to Blaze West Boca today around noon it was totally empty except for three staff. One was sloppily leaning on the counter folding boxes, one was pressing crust and the third was carelessly making pizza like it was the last thing he …More

name: Natalia Lara
text: I'm a big fan of blaze pizza! I haven't been in a while.. I used to get pizzas to go often before my evening school. I can't believe it's been so long since I last visited a blaze. This is my first time at this location and I'll definitely …More

name: Yori Berlinski
text: It's my first time hear came with my son and we love it. They have all kinds of pizza from normal crust, keti and cauliflower. We ordered the 1 topping which was enough for both of us. But this is a new and great addition to west boca. Please try it out

name: Jason Napsky
text: It was my first time there and the staff were very nice and the food was even better. I would highly recommend it.

name: Pablo Hermida
text: Nice place, great service, awesome pizza!!! I recommen this place it is so good...

name: Matt MC
text: Pizza was excellent and staff was awesome. Katelyn was superb! Very knowledgeable, polite, and very experienced! Knew what she was doing. Fast but courteous! Will definitely be back!

name: Stephanie DiGregorio
text: I love going to Blaze, as a vegan my options are usually limited, but at Blaze they even change their gloves for me!

name: Amber Lynn Benson
text: Most staff don't even know what gluten free and vegan mean. It was very difficult for me to find out the ingredients to the dough and create a pizza.

name: Devorah Stein
text: Service was rude and when a complaint  was made, manager was indifferent.  I will  not  return  to  this  location.

name: Ron Motiram
text: Not the best, dominoes is better and they deliver.

name: Veronica Parodi
text: Best pizza I've ever had. I always get the green stripe pizza with tomato sauce and spinach. It's kind of like subway but instead of subs you make your own pizza. They also make it really fast. And the service and quality is great. Their aqua refreshers are also really good. Great prices too.

name: Rochelle Anish
text: To make your own salad or pizza was fun to do. The pizzas could have any and all toppings without uping the price. You can choose  the crusts too. This goes for the salads. All was tasty too.

name: : Rijaro
text: Great pizza like a chipotle but instead of burritos they make pizzas and they are amazing

name: Elisa A
text: We’ve been eating at the East Boca location for over 2 years now, so we were THRILLED that they opened up 3 minutes from our home AND right next door to a new Drive Thru Starbucks!!! …More

name: David Goldstein
text: Good overall experience, compares well with other build your own pizza places. They ran out of a couple ingredients like artichokes while we were there. Also it was a fundraiser night, so pretty crowded when we visited. We'll definitely go again on another night and check to make sure there aren't any events going on.

name: Lauren Hinds
text: Recently moved from Nj and it’s been s task to try to find good pizza in Florida !  because of the reviews we decided to try blaze ! Ugh so disappointed and left hungry after the pizzas came burnt to a crisp , not even edible ! My dogs …More

name: Octy
text: Delicious pizza in a nice clean facility. I really enjoy the food there. I’m giving 3 stars because they seem to be allowing solicitation outside their door. These solicitors are complete with folding tables and everything. They are there …More

name: Saurabh Joshi
text: They gave us uncooked garlic role and due to that I had bloating and gas for a week.  At the end have to go to see doctor.. dont expect anyone to go to any medical facility during pandemic outbreak..

name: Martin
text: Pizza is good! Best round pizza in area and a great price as well.  Staff is friendly and the place is clean.

name: Nadia Greenidge
text: Excellent fast fried pizza, great taste and price.

name: Marco Delgado
text: Pizzas just for a hurry, not amazing but not bad too

name: Kerri
text: 2nd time here.. food excellent as always. Tables are hard to find and get messy during busy times. No wiping down, only one garbage can, which causes people to leave their stuff in random places - like near the drinks machine. We do enjoy the food and the prices. Always leave satisfied and full.

name: James scarpinato
text: I got the regular meat eater. First time I've been there. My family goes a good bit. I'd recommend the high-rise dough if you like a fluffier bread. Very good pizza. Atmosphere is clean and friendly.

name: Neila Weber
text: Pizza for all pizza lovers. Vegan options as well as gluten free options. Reasonable prices

name: Jaden Yeo
text: The crust of the pizza is very thin and the ingredients are fresh, which makes the perfect combination of your choice of 2 toppings, vegetable or meat, thin crust, delicious margarita or pesto sauce, and warm, gooey cheese. The pizza is …More

name: Megan Lundrigan
text: Love this place always great service and the food is always amazing! We go there at least once a week and we are never disappointed.

name: Aramis Tanelus
text: The 1st time I ever visited Blaze pizza it was great. This time not so great. The pizza was dry and over cooked. For the price and quality of this order it wasn't worth it for me. So it will be a while before I return.

name: Patricia James
text: My 3 time eating here and I love the pizza the workers are very sweet

name: F T
text: The pizza was great as usual. I have been to a few different Blaze locations. What I never understand is why they can't clean their tables. Honestly is such a turn off to have to clean your own table to eat. There were 6 people behind the counter (doing nothing) and only 2 other customers already eating. Not one clean table... really??

name: Megan Rosales
text: Best blaze location. Never had any issues and always super clean and fast. Even the pick up area is easy to find and get your food from.

name: Sarai Mercedes Torres Asuaje
text: Pizza is great, price is good the staff sucks! service is not great....

name: Gillian Sapia
text: I’m dairy free and I read the allergen warning that you take great care in avoiding cross contamination and that it sometimes happens. I get that... However watched a girl make a pizza for her coworker take the alfredo sauce spoon just dripping and drenched white and mix it with the red sauce.

name: Myles Sockin
text: I was very impressed with Blaze Pizza and we'll definitely go back there again with my girlfriend it's better than Domino's and some other local pizza places right near by

name: Steve F
text: Much better than I expected.  Will definitely go back again

name: jackiet20
text: Have had their regular pizza before and it’s  very good! Not NYC/NJ good, but very good. The staff at this location are super helpful and very nice. The only negative thing I can say is we ordered the Keto crust for delivery last night and ended up giving the pizza to our dogs.....just Skip the keto crust next time.

name: Doug Marek
text: Pizza was decent, however I think the staff are all zombies (or they hate their job). Not very well trained. Interactions with customers are devoid of sincerity or pleasantness. If there is a manager at the restaurant, it wasn't obvious.

name: Maria Ramirez-Silva
text: This pizza, as my son put it, "is supa hot fiya"

name: Derek Miller
text: I tried Blaze for the first time over the weekend and was impressed by the quality of the food. They have a wide range of options, such as gluten-free and vegan options. I recommend getting the build your own. The service was really quick, …More

name: Dón Panamá
text: Best Pizza I have ever eaten in my life!!! ..Brooklyn has nothing on this….

name: Julie Sonenberg
text: Great, awesome for vegans. Delicious thin crust pizza.

name: Bob Kay
text: This store in West Boca has young and energetic staff members.  Great attitude! It was a pleasure to get my pizzas. I haven't seen kids this good for a long time! Either they have amazing parents or amazing management, or both!!

name: Cheryl Glover
text: Oh my. Have our your way. Thre best way.

name: Bethanne Gordon
text: What a great manager.. Turned a bad situation into a great one by personally making my gluten free crust by hand because the machines were both used with flour.. Thank you so much for your understanding!!

name: Craig F
text: Great pizza but a little pricey

name: Fernicia Smart
text: Delicious Fresh Hot Fast All ingredients I Love

name: jean hugues polycart
text: Fast service and great employees

name: Tracey Beattie
text: Delicious pizza!! I wish their was one in Delray Beach!

name: Mark Mccann
text: Very good pizza. I do enjoy making my own pie. The is thin and a good bite to it.

name: Justo Cabezas Jr.
text: Wow, this place is incredible! It was my first time there. They have a special menu for all kinds of different pizza. I just took out a simple pepperoni and bacon pizza for only about $8! …More

name: Nic Sanchez
text: Great service. I had a problem with my online order and when I got there they helped me out.

name: Mike Vietro
text: Great pizza great service great price

name: Patricia Weir
text: Enjoyed the experience.  Pizza was great! Only suggestion is to keep behind counter cleaner.  If you have an open view into the prep area it should stay swept and very clean.  Could discourage some people

name: Brian Heideger
text: Good pizza for its price. A little flat on the dough side of things. But all in all a good choice for "fast" pizza.

name: Dee Tree
text:
Finally after a year I was able to get my account to work on my daughter's IPhone.The app will not work on
my phone.  Pizza is great just wish the APP would work on all phones

name: Cait G.
text: Ashley, Tabitha, and Corey are awesome! Totally shined where doordash screwed up. They were kind and engaging while fixing a mistake that wasn't even their fault. They are the reason I will continue to give my money to Blaze.

name: Charles Esposito
text: 2 great pizzas for only $15, fast,fresh inexpensive

name: Andreia Dickens
text: Noise and the floor and table were dirty. I bought 3 pizzas and one was very burned on the bottom!

name: Dani B
text: Protein pizza is perfect for my keto needs!

name: Albert CA
text: Very attentive delicious fried bake pizza

name: Gregg Rosales
text: Took my wife and kids here line was loong but they got it down in a quick and orderly fashion everyone on staff was incredibly nice and helpful by far my favorite blaze location that I've been to.

name: Christopher Stewart
text: Been here twice so far.  Had the Red Vine and Hot Link pizzas.  Both were pretty good, the Hot Link is spicy!  They could do a better job of evenly distributing the ingredients though, they just kind of throw them on there.

name: Darren Williams
text: Tried here for the 1st time. I'm a Meat Lover and it made me want another... Mini Pizza Pies

name: Kevin O'Neill
text: We got a "Keto" crust pizza that was good. Not as good as a regular ctust pizza but if you are eating Keto and craving a pizza it is pretty good. I got mozzarella, sausage, meatballs, chicken, and roasted garlic cloves with red sauce. Kind of covered that craving for a pie!

name: William Jazon Jr.
text: Can get pretty busy but hard to beat for quality for the price, especially for the build your own pizzas with unlimited toppings. Their dough rolls are Amazing!

name: Kelly Elrod
text: Excellent idea and really good pizza!  Parking is the only complaint that I have.  The choices for toppings are amazing and will keep us cooking back to try new combinations.

name: Chris Welenc
text: This is a great Barnes and Noble.  My girlfriend and I spent about two hours in there and found all the books we were looking for and more!! Very helpful staff, definitely will be back!!

name: Niesha Edwards
text: Great experience, great customer service, pizza taste fresh and made to perfection

name: Lou Garlobo
text: The food was good but you need to be careful when you check out to pay. The lady in the cash register charged me more than what I purchased. She did it twice.

text: Great staff and the pizza is awesome and really delicious

name: Giles Levy
text: The other Blaze Pizzas I've been to (Boca on Federal and two in Tallahassee) are 5 star, but not this one. There was so much of the other items (mostly cheese and I'm vegan) in all.of the containers of marinara and the two employees I asked would not take sauce from a fresh container for me.

name: Danica Arce
text: Really good pizza and awesome customer service.  A girl behind the counter, Katelyn, put the toppings on so perfectly and was such a ray of sunshine while she was putting my pizza together!
